text.div:
MedicationDispenseStatus

A code specifying the state of the dispense event.

Describes the lifecycle of the dispense.

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-dispense-status

CodeDisplayDefinition
in progressThe dispense has started but has not yet completed.
on holdActions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".
completedAll actions that are implied by the dispense have occurred.
entered in errorThe dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.
stoppedActions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

name: MedicationDispenseStatus
description:
A code specifying the state of the dispense event.

Describes the lifecycle of the dispense.

concept.definition: The dispense has started but has not yet completed.
Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".
All actions that are implied by the dispense have occurred.
The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.
Actions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
